title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0]
description: When an invalid filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the result set is returning incorrect data or null result set.
OB: Currently, when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0], the data set is returning incorrect results or null.
EB: An appropriate error message should pop up when an invalid filter expression is set on row[0].
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Set an invalid filter expression on row[0] (e.g., 'row[0] equals to 0'). 
3. Verify that the data set is returning incorrect results or a null result set.
